name: v8.118.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Switch to Python Profiling v2 from v1 by @rithikanarayan in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/674
* Remove python 3.8 build by @cbeauchesne in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/675
* Adds fail-fast on build job by @cbeauchesne in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/678
* exclude ddtrace v3.19.0 by @rithikanarayan in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/684
* ddtrace version less than 3.19.0 by @rithikanarayan in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/686
* Fix case-insensitive header redaction by @astuyve in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/685
* ci(system-tests): fix ddtrace py build from source by @florentinl in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/690
* Adding Python 3.14 by @rithikanarayan in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/677
* Stop running update-snapshots nightly. by @purple4reina in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/692
* chore: release v8.118.0 by @joeyzhao2018 in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/691

## New Contributors
* @cbeauchesne made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/pull/675

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/compare/v8.117.0...v8.118.0




>[!IMPORTANT]
> `dd-trace-py` version is [v3.18.1](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-py/releases/tag/v3.18.1)
